mapper.insert: insert into RECRUITMENTS values( S_RECRUITMENT_SEQ.nextval, #{employerSeq}, #{recruitmentTitle}, #{recruitmentType}, #{recruitmentSize}, #{startingWorkingDate}, #{endingWorkingDate}, #{totalWorkingDay}, #{startingWorkingTime}, #{endingWorkingTime}, #{totalWorkingTime}, #{wage}, #{wageType}, #{gender}, #{minAge}, #{maxAge}, #{recruitmentContents}, #{requirementQuestion1}, #{requirementQuestion2}, #{requirementQuestion3}, #{workingPlaceAddress}, #{closingDate}, sysdate )
